topics.body:
*Listening to Sargon of Akkad*
"Shit like this is why makes fun of you Europe":https://www.youtube.com/watch?x-yt-cl=85114404&v=ir1oMGU0m_M&x-yt-ts=1422579428
I'll admit naming your kid Nutella is fucking stupid, but a judge should not have the right to name your child.  I'll take my good old stupid usa with shitty roads, people that think vaccines cause autism and shit over authoritarian governments.

Women in France can't even wear what they want in swimming pools nor are any form of religious iconography are allowed in schools, even if it's something as simple as say a purity ring (if you're wondering what a purity ring is it's a religious ring symbolizing abstinence).

European government summarized in a nutshell, "I'm not racist I'm not racist I'm not racist I'm not racist I'm not racist"

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54cfb02163687264da7e0500#post_54cfb02163687264da7e0500
In some places in Europe it's legally required to refer to transgender individuals by "xir" or such even if the individual identifies as say female or male.


Call me crazy, but English majors: shit like this is why we *NEED* singular "they" to be considered proper English so that shit doesn't spill over here.  Imagine you legally being required to refer to individuals as "xe/xir" or such or you would get in fuck tons of trouble for some bullshit reason.
